column2: Choose one, if all are taken take 1d8 damage instead: You banish a random part of your body instead and as much as you try it never comes back;  Starting the next time you sleep, you have nightmares of all those that have been banished over the ages; You see partially into another reality randomly once a day and cannot distinguish it from the reality you inhabit until it goes away;
You lose this spell until the next time you rest for at least 8 hours and gain a Corruption.
One target that you can touch must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 1 round.

One target that you can touch must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 1d4 rounds.  Only one target can be banished at a time.  If a new target is banished before the first target returns, the first target returns as the new target is banished.

One target within 30' of you must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 1d6 rounds.  Only one target can be banished at a time.  If a new target is banished before the first target returns, the first target returns as the new target is banished.
Up to two targets within 30' of you must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 1d6 rounds.
Up to two targets within 30' of you must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 1d10 rounds.
Up to two targets within 30' of you must make an Intelligence response against the spellcheck or be removed from reality for 2d6 rounds.
